title: John Layfield’s WWE Stardom
text:
John Layfield joins the podcast this week to discuss his career in professional wrestling and working for WWE.

Layfield starts by discussing his time playing football and briefly playing for the Oakland Raiders. He dives into the professional wrestling world, and what it was like working for organized crime around the world as a professional wrestler.

His career changed when he joined WWE and when the company's success skyrocketed in the 90s. He reveals his life in WWE and what it's like behind the scenes.
